item.title: HACK ROBOY - The ultimate robotics hackathon
item.description: This weekend I had a fun at awesome Hack Roboy hackathon organized by Roboy team. They create nice robot and it is second event. I’ve never try to programming robots, so there is new and remarkable experience for me. Friday evening we start brainstorming ideas (or bearstorming, it is München, baby). The most important - we were not alone. Roboy team helps to understand capabilities and push to right way. After that everyone can pitch his or any idea.
